creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: rubbing: eight lines of tightly spaced characters; last three lines are slightly smaller; dark brown paper mount
markings: Japanese inscription along top of roll; various markings on back R; URC, rectangular relief seal; LLC, square intaglio and square relief seals; label R roller end: [F. Toko Rubbing]
title: Poem of 1849
